sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous serons toujours amis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We will always be friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce poisson est très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This fish is very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelqu'un frappe à la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Someone is knocking at the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'air du matin est très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The morning air is very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veux-tu m'aider ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Are you willing to help me?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī nián yǒu shí'èr gè yuèfèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Une année a douze mois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A year has twelve months.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La lune est très ronde ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The moon is very round tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette réponse est correcte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This answer is correct.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shuāng xié de dàxiǎo zhènghǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La taille de ces chaussures est juste parfaite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The size of these shoes is just right.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ néng děng tā huílái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux qu'attendre son retour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can only wait for him to come back.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je préfère manger de la cuisine chinoise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I prefer to eat Chinese food.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais au travail à vélo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ride a bicycle to work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il apprend le chinois de niveau intermédiaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is studying intermediate Chinese.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quels sont tes projets pour le week-end ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What are your plans for the weekend?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì jīntiān kè de zhòngdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est le point clé du cours d'aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the key point of today's lesson.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est la raison principale ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the main reason?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒmen xiǎozǔ de zǔzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le chef de notre groupe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is the leader of our group.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de devoirs aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a lot of homework today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng zū yī jiān fángzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux louer une maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to rent a house.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne touche pas ta bouche avec les mains.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't touch your mouth with your hands.
